definition: to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch
erhua variant of 衣鉤|衣钩[yi1 gou1]

sentences.english: Thomas took off his overcoat and hung it on the hook.
sentences.chinese: 托馬斯脫下外套，掛在衣鉤上。

sentences.english: Hang your coat up on the hook.
sentences.chinese: 把你的大衣掛在衣鉤上。

sentences.english: Hang your overcoat on the peg in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 把你的大衣掛在門廳的掛衣鉤上。

sentences.english: We hanged up we clothes dawn hooks.
sentences.chinese: 我們把衣服掛在衣鉤上。

sentences.english: We hanged up our clothes with hooks.
sentences.chinese: 我們把衣服掛在衣鉤上。

sentences.english: Tom hung his coat on the hook behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆把衣服掛在門後的衣鉤上。
